attributes.review: as soon as i got the app my entire phone started to glitch and random words and scrambled letters were popping up all over?? on top of that a bunch of my photos and videos deleted and i have terrifying videos i’ve never seen before. i watched all of them and i feel extremely threatened. i cant sleep. this is the worst app i’ve ever had.
attributes.title: this is TERRIBLE!!!

attributes.review: I AM SHOCKED AND DISAPPOINTED by how absolutely horrible this app was. Not only is it taking up space on my phone BUT it also has one of the MOST corrupted last names printed on it. Notifications would pop up to disrupt my TVD watching, which was completely unnecessary. Does Trump not have President things to do? Why in the WORLD does he keep messaging me? Well, I guess, he doesn’t do a good job running the country anyways so I guess this explains it.... Though, I do have to say that the worst part was that when I tried to order a pizza on it and to my complete horror: IT WOULDN’T LET ME!!!! There seemed to be no buttons on this app for my pizza ordering and it quite frankly, offends me. I also tried to find some games to play on it but there seemed to be only information supporting some racist, homophobic, sexist cheeto!!!! 10/10 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND! I will be contacting Apple Support to help fix whatever issue is going on here.
attributes.title: shocked and disappointed

attributes.review: I ABSOLUTELY HATE THIS APP... IT KEPT CRASHING AND EVERYTHING WAS JUST ACTING UP AND IT DIDNT WORK
attributes.title: Really bad

attributes.review: This app wack and you know it, this stupid ahh app brainwashed people into thinking this CLOWN CHEETO of a "president" is worthy of being in office. Trash all of the Trump supporters are clowns. 🤗🤗🤗🤗🤪🤪🤪🤪😜😜😜😜🤡🤡🤡🤡💩💩💩💩💩💩💩💩

attributes.review: Was a terrible app and would not work at all
attributes.title: Please delete

attributes.review: After me trying to go to it, my phone kept crashing and I wasn’t trying to look at popped up ads showing up or what I needed to sign up for. I am so upset with this app, I literally tried to go into it and it kept sending me out and making my phone go blank. After that, it was so unbelievably wrong on how the app is set up. The app needs more work to it... but from in general, it really needs some work to it.
attributes.title: Problem here!

attributes.review: This app has many side affects, including throwing up, migraines from uncultured and bland people, hallucinations of a Cheeto that’s so called “the president”, and don’t get me started about it drives you crazy enough to shoot yourself  simultaneously after seeing the hideous  logo that could make you go blind. P.S I’d stay away from this app if I were you. And watch out for the racist rapist and homophobic, islamophobic white supremacist that’s “leading” this country.
